channel.title: [317] Monster only killable with certain weps
channel.description: I'm adding a small dungeoneering mini to my server, in which im using the bulwark beast as one of the bosses, does anyone know how to make the npc only attackable when wielding a pickaxe?

item.title: [317] Monster only killable with certain weps
item.dc:creator: @Dishonor Dishonor
item.description:
@Dishonor wrote:

It worked rep++ thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Monster only killable with certain weps
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Depends on what base you’re using…

But, basically- search FullVerac(), that explains how to check if a player is wearing items. Then, find that under KQ (Kalphite Queen, Idk ID) if you have him, and add the NPCID of the boss under that. Basically, copy KQ’s code, change the NPCID, and change the FullVerac(); to like, WearingPickaxe(); (requiring you made the void already).

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Monster only killable with certain weps
